price: Pa dyshim, Zoti yt di atë që fshehin zemrat e tyre dhe atë që e shfaqin haptazi.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka layaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
